help_text.general: Skills represent specific areas of training and expertise. Your total bonus on a skill check is your ranks in the skill + the modifier from its governing Ability. Each 2 ranks in a skill costs 1 Power Point (PP). Your total skill bonus (Ability Mod + Ranks) cannot exceed your Power Level (PL) + 10. The maximum ranks you can normally buy in a skill is PL + 5.
help_text.specialization_note: Skills like Close Combat, Ranged Combat, and Expertise require you to choose a specific focus (e.g., 'Close Combat: Swords', 'Expertise: Magic'). You buy ranks in each specialization separately as if it were its own skill.

list.name: Acrobatics
list.description: Covers feats of balance, coordination, tumbling, aerial maneuvers, and escaping from grabs or restraints. Governed by Agility. Trained Only.

list.name: Athletics
list.description: Represents overall physical fitness and training for activities like climbing, jumping, running, and swimming. Governed by Strength.

list.name: Close Combat
list.specialization_prompt: Specify weapon or unarmed style (e.g., Swords, Unarmed, Claws, Grappling)
list.description: Skill in a specific form of close-quarters fighting. Adds its rank to your Fighting ability for attack checks with that specific form of combat. Each specialization is a separate skill.

list.name: Deception
list.description: The ability to lie, mislead, feint in combat, disguise yourself, or pass on secret messages. Governed by Presence.

list.name: Expertise
list.specialization_prompt: Specify field of Expertise (e.g., Magic, Science, History, Streetwise, specific profession)
list.description: Represents knowledge and training in a particular field of study or profession. Governed by Intellect. Trained Only. Each field of Expertise is a separate skill.

list.name: Insight
list.description: The ability to discern truth from falsehood, sense underlying motives, and resist attempts to deceive or influence you. Governed by Awareness.

list.name: Intimidation
list.description: The ability to influence others through threats, displays of power, or by inspiring fear. Governed by Presence.

list.name: Investigation
list.description: The ability to find clues, gather and analyze evidence, and follow trails of information. Governed by Intellect. Trained Only.

list.name: Perception
list.description: The ability to notice things using your senses, including spotting hidden objects or details, and detecting approaching danger. Governed by Awareness.

list.name: Persuasion
list.description: The ability to influence others through diplomacy, tact, charm, and reasoned argument. Governed by Presence.

list.name: Ranged Combat
list.specialization_prompt: Specify weapon or attack type (e.g., Pistols, Bows, Energy Blasts, Throwing)
list.description: Skill in a specific form of ranged fighting. Adds its rank to your Dexterity ability for attack checks with that specific form of combat. Each specialization is a separate skill.

list.name: Sleight of Hand
list.description: The ability to perform tasks requiring manual dexterity and misdirection, such as pickpocketing, concealing objects, or performing stage magic. Governed by Dexterity. Trained Only.

list.name: Stealth
list.description: The ability to move unseen and unheard, and to hide effectively. Governed by Agility.

list.name: Technology
list.description: Knowledge and skill in operating, repairing, building, and bypassing technological devices. Governed by Intellect. Trained Only.

list.name: Treatment
list.description: The ability to provide medical aid, diagnose illnesses, treat injuries, and stabilize dying characters. Governed by Intellect. Trained Only.

list.name: Vehicles
list.description: The ability to operate and maneuver various types of vehicles. Governed by Dexterity. Trained Only.
